delete.warnDelete: Ticking this checkbox will delete everything contained in those torrents

rule.savePathPlaceholder: Leave blank to use default save path

shutdown.content: Do you really want to shutdown qBittorrent?

tag.comma: Name cannot contain comma when renaming a tag
tag.hint: Pro tip: multiple tags can be created by separating them with a comma
tag.name: Tag name

Editing the tag name will migrate torrents to the new tag.
Errors may happen, use with caution.

addPanel.torrentsPendingCount: {n} torrent awaiting upload | {n} torrents awaiting upload

bottom_actions.dark_mode: Light mode | Dark mode | Follow system settings

promise.error: An error occured while marking articles

refreshPromise.error: An error occured while refreshing feeds

libtorrent.announceAllTrackers: Always announce to all trackers in a tier
libtorrent.announceIP: IP address reported to trackers (requires restart)

i2p.invalidLength: I2P length values must be between 0 and 7
i2p.invalidQuantity: I2P quantity values must be between 1 and 16
i2p.restartNeeded: Any changes in these settings will take effect the next time the SAM connection is re-established (by restarting I2P or changing I2P address or port)

networking.peerTos: DSCP value for connections to peers

libtorrent.requestQueueSize: Maximum outstanding requests to a single peer

security.allowMultipleConnectionsFromTheSameIPAdd: Allow multiple connections from the same IP address
security.blockPeersOnPrivilegedPorts: Disallow connection to peers on privileged ports

ssl.disclaimer:
The "SSL torrent" feature is not standardized, there are no BEP (BitTorrent Enhancement Proposals) associated with it.
Enable this feature only if you need it.

embeddedTracker.portForward: Enable port forwarding for embedded tracker
embeddedTracker.title: Embedded Tracker

ipAddress.label: Optional IP address to bind to

qbittorrent.pythonExecutablePathHint: Auto detect if empty, require restart
qbittorrent.reannounceOnIpPortChanged: Reannounce to all trackers when IP or port changed

bittorrent.autoAddTrackers: Automatically append these trackers to new downloads

privacy.enableDHT: Enable DHT (decentralized network) to find more peers
privacy.enableLPD: Enable Local Peer Discovery to find more peers
privacy.enablePeX: Enable Peer Exchange (PeX) to find more peers

torrentQueueing.excludeSlowTorrent: Do not count slow torrents in these limits

connectionLimits.globalMaxUploadSlots: Global maximum number of upload slots
connectionLimits.perTorrentMaxConnection: Maximum number of connections per torrent
connectionLimits.perTorrentMaxUploadSlots: Maximum number of upload slots per torrent

i2p.disclaimer: If "Mixed Mode" is enabled, I2P torrents are allowed to also get peers from other sources than the tracker, and connect to regular IPs, not providing any anonymization. This may be useful if the user is not interested in the anonymization of I2P, but still wants to be able to connect to I2P peers.
i2p.rule: Port value must be between 0 and 65535

listeningPort.useUPnP: Use UPnP / NAT-PMP port forwarding from my router

auth.subtitle: Authentication
auth.tip: Info: The password is saved unencrypted

mailNotification.sslEnabled: This server requires a secure connection (SSL)

Email request sent!

monitoredFolders.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

general.canvasRefreshThreshold: Piece count to disable canvas auto-refresh
general.canvasRenderThreshold: Piece count to disable canvas rendering

paginationSize.label: Pagination Size
paginationSize.warning: Using high values can affect performance

general.tip: These settings are for the custom WebUI itself
general.useBinarySize: Replace data sizes by binary units (kB -> KiB)
general.useBitSpeed: Replace speed values by bits (kB/s -> kbps)
